document.masterDocTitle: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature quotes .
YEMEN
: Aden governorate , Aden . El-Hadj [locality not found] (d’Orbigny 1913a). Without locality (Scott in Paulian 1948 )
.

Distribution . Arabian Peninsula : Yemen (d’Orbigny 1913a). Africa : Eritrea , South Africa , Tanzania (d’Orbigny 1900), Somalia (d’Orbigny 1913a), Ethiopia , Nigeria , Sudan ( Arrow 1931 ), Asia : Pakistan ( Ziani & Bezděk 2016 ).

Remarks . First record for Oman . All the literature records for
Saudi Arabia
( Arrow 1931 ; Scott in Paulian 1948 ; Baltahsar 1963; Zunino 1975 , 1981 ) are without precise locality, and could be due to a wrong reading of d’Orbigny (1913a) who reported: “ Arabia : Yemen , Aden ”. Therefore, we herein choose to exclude this species from the fauna of the
Saudi Arabia
, until proven otherwise.
